missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block line of sight to Lieutenant Alphus.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You proceed with caution into the fortified yet still richly decorated facility.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText:
"Head towards his personal quarters," Ahsoka tells you. "Gann will probably be somewhere in the vicinity. I'll find my way through the base and disable security systems - don't worry, though, I'll catch up to you."

{-} <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> deploys with the Rebels.
A man in an officer's uniform looks up in surprise as you advance. "Blast that rebel scum!", he shrieks.

{-} The door is locked. When Lieutenant Alphus is defeated, the door unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is found.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. When Lieutenant Alphus is defeated, the door unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is found.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
By successfully disabling the comm hub, Ahsoka assures you no Imperial reinforcements are coming - Gann is all but captured. She graciously thanks you for your help and promises her aid if you require it.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Ahsoka Tano</color> (Rebel Instigator) as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

The fighting grows too tense and there is no sign of Ahsoka; you are forced to flee from the residence through an open window. As you pass the bodies of two other members of your strike team, you realize the pointlessness of their deaths.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

Lieutenant Alphus finally collapses under your attacks, and you take the code cylinder from his uniform.

{-} The door is now unlocked.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A richly decorated door leads into the personal quarters of Admiral Gann.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is found.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The door opens into a luxurious suite filled with exquisite furniture and even some expensive artwork on the walls.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A richly decorated door leads into the personal quarters of Admiral Gann.

{-} The door is locked. When Lieutenant Alphus is defeated, the door unlocks.

eventActions.tbText: A man in a captain's uniform is pointing his blaster at you. "Get them!", he shouts.
{-} The door is locked. When Captain Beilan is defeated, the door unlocks.
Captain Beilan is accompanied by some bodyguards.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to Captain Beilan.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. When Captain Beilan is defeated, the door unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is found.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Captain Beilan drops to his knees. You train your blasters on him, and finally he hands you his code cylinder, grimacing as he presses his hand on a wound in his side.

{-} The door is now unlocked.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A blast door leads deeper into the facility. Scrambled com chatter can be heard from behind.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is found.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Behind the door lies a busy comm hub, with consoles and displays blinking. As soon as you enter, you can hear an alarm blaring.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A blast door leads deeper into the facility. Scrambled com chatter can be heard from behind.

{-} The door is locked. When Captain Beilan is defeated, the door unlocks.

eventActions.tbText: A gaunt man with a cruel expression on his face watches you emotionlessly. "You are intruding on Imperial property, terrorist scum. Surrender now and you might be spared."

The alarm is probably controlled by the main console, safely protected by a vault door at the end of the hub.

{-} The door is locked. When Admiral Gann is defeated, the door unlocks.
Soldiers raise their weapons as you advance toward Gann.

eventActions.repositionText: Block line of sight to Admiral Gann.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked. When Admiral Gann is defeated, the door unlocks.
{-} The mission will progress when Admiral Gann is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Admiral Gann finally stumbles back, drops his blaster, and raises his hands in surrender.  "You won't get away with this, terrorists!", he snarls.

You grab his arm and push him toward the vault door.

{-} The door is now unlocked.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: A sturdy security door protects a small vault. The comm hub's controls should be somewhere in there.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The mission will progress when the vault door is opened.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The vault door slides open, revealing a small control room.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door protects a small vault. The comm hub's controls should be somewhere in there.

{-} The door is locked. When Admiral Gann is defeated, the door unlocks.

eventActions.tbText: The main communications console is still sending out the alarm.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The comm hub's main console is blinking, with data running across its screens.

{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and slice it.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and slice it.
{-} The Rebels win when the terminal is sliced.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A healthy Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and slice it.
{-} The Rebels win when the terminal is sliced.
{-} The Rebels lose if all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Blaster shots rain down on Ahsoka until finally one clips her, dropping her to her knees. She struggles back to her feet when a second shot hits her, dropping her again. "I'm sorry," she gasps, barely deflecting a third shot with her lightsaber. "You go on, I'll try to lead a few of them off!"
"Alright - I've got a few more things to do," Ahsoka says. "I'll see you guys later." Ahsoka slices through a grate in the ceiling before Force leaping out of sight into the air vent.
An air vent grate is kicked into the room, and Ahsoka leaps down, lightsabers ignited. "Good to see you again, folks!", she calls before turning her attention to Beilan.
Glowing white blades cut through the wall of the comm hub, opening another entrance through which Ahsoka steps, a grim expression on her face. "Let's finish this." She points her lightsabers at Gann.

eventActions.mainText:
You quickly start to disable the comm hub.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress - the call for reinforcements is still out. You need to keep trying.
